title: Master of Business Administration
description: Advanced degree that provides theoretical and practical training in business principles and leadership skills.

title: Masters in Digital Marketing
description: Learned marketing principles & practice, data analysis, marketing communication, consumer behaviour, customer engagement strategies, advertising fundamentals, campaign planning, research methodology, SEO, SEM & lead generation

title: Full Stack Developer Bootcamp
description: Trained in every layer of a web application stack, to include user interface to front-end, middle-tier, & back-end components, using popular coding languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Node.js, React, Asp.net, & Python as well as peripheral technologies & methodologies, including GitHub, Agile, & Scrum.
